KappaMod:AquaJet.NAME: Aqua Jet
KappaMod:AquaJet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Ripple 1. NL kappamod:Surging: Deals 1 more damage.

KappaMod:BubbleDragon.NAME: Fire! Bubble Dragon!
KappaMod:BubbleDragon.DESCRIPTION: Add as many kappamod:Bubbled cards to your hand as possible. NL They cost 0 this turn.

KappaMod:ReactiveArmor.NAME: Reactive Armor
KappaMod:ReactiveArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The first time you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

KappaMod:CleansingGeyser.NAME: Cleansing Geyser
KappaMod:CleansingGeyser.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your discard pile. NL Deal !D! damage times its cost.

KappaMod:DashCancel.NAME: Dash Cancel
KappaMod:DashCancel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you played an Attack this turn, gain [E].

KappaMod:DividingEdge.NAME: Dividing Edge
KappaMod:DividingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy is kappamod:Drowning, deal !D! damage again.

KappaMod:EruptingGeyser.NAME: Erupting Geyser
KappaMod:EruptingGeyser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.
KappaMod:EruptingGeyser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a card from your discard pile to your hand.

KappaMod:ExtendingArm.NAME: Extending Arm
KappaMod:ExtendingArm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Ripple 1. NL kappamod:Float !M!. NL kappamod:Receding: kappamod:Float !M! again.

KappaMod:GenbuShell.NAME: Genbu Shell
KappaMod:GenbuShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL kappamod:Ripple !M!. NL kappamod:Surging: kappamod:Float !M!.

KappaMod:HydroCamouflage.NAME: Hydro Camouflage
KappaMod:HydroCamouflage.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP before the end of the enemies' turn. NL Next turn, if this was not triggered, gain [E] and draw !M! cards. Exhaust.

KappaMod:Hydrometry.NAME: Hydrometry
KappaMod:Hydrometry.DESCRIPTION: kappamod:Ripple 2. NL Gain !M! Block for each card with kappamod:Ripple played this turn. NL kappamod:Receding: Gain the same amount of Block next turn.

KappaMod:KappaFlashFlood.NAME: Kappa Flash Flood
KappaMod:KappaFlashFlood.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! kappamod:Drown and 2 kappamod:Submerge to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

KappaMod:KikuIchimonji.NAME: Kiku-Ichimonji Compressor
KappaMod:KikuIchimonji.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL kappamod:Ripple 2. NL kappamod:Surging: kappamod:Float !M!.

KappaMod:LooseCannon.NAME: Loose Cannon
KappaMod:LooseCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

KappaMod:MassProduction.NAME: Mass Production
KappaMod:MassProduction.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose a Skill or Power, except *Mass *Production. Add {!M!|@=!M!|1=a} cop{!M!|@=ies|1=y} of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

KappaMod:NessieSortie.NAME: Nessie Sortie
KappaMod:NessieSortie.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

KappaMod:OozeFlooding.NAME: Ooze Flooding
KappaMod:OozeFlooding.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply X{!Upgrades!|>0=+1} Weak. NL Apply X{!Upgrades!|>0=+1} kappamod:Submerge. NL Exhaust.

KappaMod:OpticalCamouflage.NAME: Optical Camouflage
KappaMod:OpticalCamouflage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, if you didn't take unblocked attack damage, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

KappaMod:Overcharge.NAME: Overcharge
KappaMod:Overcharge.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Add 2 *Dazed to your discard pile.

KappaMod:Overflow.NAME: Overflow
KappaMod:Overflow.DESCRIPTION: This turn, all kappamod:Surging and kappamod:Receding effects trigger regardless of your *Flood.
KappaMod:Overflow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, all kappamod:Surging and kappamod:Receding effects trigger regardless of your *Flood.

KappaMod:PhotonTorpedo.NAME: Photon Torpedo
KappaMod:PhotonTorpedo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 kappamod:Submerge to a random enemy !M! times. NL (Applies kappamod:Submerge after all damage has been dealt.)

KappaMod:SanpeiFighter.NAME: Sanpei Fighter
KappaMod:SanpeiFighter.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Float !M!. NL Next turn, draw {!M!|1=a|@=!M!} card{!M!|1=|@=s}.

KappaMod:ShikirodamaExtraction.NAME: Shikirodama Extraction
KappaMod:ShikirodamaExtraction.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

KappaMod:SignboardSmash.NAME: Signboard Smash
KappaMod:SignboardSmash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Surging: Deals 3 more damage. NL kappamod:Receding: Gains 3 more Block.

KappaMod:SpringPunch.NAME: Spring Punch
KappaMod:SpringPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! kappamod:Submerge. NL kappamod:Receding: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

KappaMod:SteamBlaster.NAME: Steam Blaster
KappaMod:SteamBlaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has kappamod:Submerge, gain [E] and draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

KappaMod:SuperScope3D.NAME: Super Scope 3D
KappaMod:SuperScope3D.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies{!M!|1=|2= twice|@=!M! times}.

KappaMod:SuppressingFire.NAME: Suppressing Fire
KappaMod:SuppressingFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! kappamod:Submerge to ALL enemies. NL kappamod:Ripple 2. NL kappamod:Receding: Apply !M! kappamod:Submerge to ALL enemies.

KappaMod:ToolBag.NAME: Tool Bag
KappaMod:ToolBag.DESCRIPTION: Put a Skill from your draw pile into your hand. NL Discard 1 card.
KappaMod:ToolBag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a Skill from your draw pile into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no Skills NL in my draw pile.

KappaMod:WaterCarpet.NAME: Water Carpet
KappaMod:WaterCarpet.DESCRIPTION: kappamod:Bubble the top !M! cards of your draw pile, then, gain !B! Block for each of your kappamod:Bubbled cards.

KappaMod:WaterDriller.NAME: Water Driller
KappaMod:WaterDriller.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy has Block, deal !D! damage again.

KappaMod:WaterSwing.NAME: Water Bomb Giant Swing
KappaMod:WaterSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Ripple 1. NL kappamod:Receding: Deal !KappaMod:SPLASH_DAMAGE! damage to ALL enemies.

KappaMod:BubbleBarrier.NAME: Bubble Barrier
KappaMod:BubbleBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is kappamod:Bubbled, increase Block by !M! this combat.

KappaMod:Bubblebeam.NAME: Bubblebeam
KappaMod:Bubblebeam.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Float !M!. NL Bubble !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.

KappaMod:CascadingTorrent.NAME: Cascading Torrent
KappaMod:CascadingTorrent.DESCRIPTION: Each time you kappamod:Ripple from a card, gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity this turn.

KappaMod:CephalicPlate.NAME: Spin the Cephalic Plate
KappaMod:CephalicPlate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Bubble. NL When kappamod:Bubbled, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

KappaMod:DiluvialMere.NAME: Diluvial Mere
KappaMod:DiluvialMere.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage for each time you kappamod:Ripple this turn.

KappaMod:KegonGun.NAME: Kegon Gun
KappaMod:KegonGun.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage for each other Attack in your hand and kappamod:Bubbles.{!M!|1= NL (You have !M! other Attack.)|>1= NL (You have !M! other Attacks.)}

KappaMod:RapidsRush.NAME: Rapids Rush
KappaMod:RapidsRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is kappamod:Bubbled, reduce cost by !M! this combat.

KappaMod:RepulsorShields.NAME: Repulsor Shields
KappaMod:RepulsorShields.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Weak back.

KappaMod:Whirlpool.NAME: Whirlpool
KappaMod:Whirlpool.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! kappamod:Drown to ALL enemies X times.

KappaMod:CoreCharge.NAME: Core Charge
KappaMod:CoreCharge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

KappaMod:AerialBlaster.NAME: Aerial Blaster
KappaMod:AerialBlaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy this turn, it takes !M! damage.

KappaMod:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
KappaMod:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If enemy does NOT intend to attack, apply !M! kappamod:Submerge.

KappaMod:BottleRockets.NAME: Bottle Rockets
KappaMod:BottleRockets.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Bubble {!M!|1=a|@=!M!} card{!M!|1=|@=s} from your discard pile.

KappaMod:BubbleBounce.NAME: Bubble Bounce
KappaMod:BubbleBounce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL kappamod:Bubble this card.

KappaMod:QCumberSpeakers.NAME: QCumber Speakers
KappaMod:QCumberSpeakers.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Apply 2 kappamod:Submerge to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

KappaMod:AirDash.NAME: Air Dash
KappaMod:AirDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

KappaMod:MountainRopeway.NAME: Mountain Ropeway
KappaMod:MountainRopeway.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, kappamod:Float !M!.

KappaMod:Washout.NAME: Washout
KappaMod:Washout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kappamod:Ripple 1. NL kappamod:Surging: Apply !M! kappamod:Submerge.

KappaMod:EmpoweringBubbles.NAME: Empowering Bubbles
KappaMod:EmpoweringBubbles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is kappamod:Bubbled, increase its damage and Block by !M! this combat.

KappaMod:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
KappaMod:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Add a random card to your kappamod:Bubbles. NL Exhaust.
